name.value: C-CDA on FHIR Continuity of Care Document

description.value:
This profile was originally based on the Continuity of Care Document (CCD) Release 1.1 which itself was derived from HITSP C32 and CCD Release 1.0.
The Continuity of Care Document (CCD) profile represents a core data set of the most relevant administrative, demographic, and clinical information facts about a patient's healthcare, covering one or more healthcare encounters. It provides a means for one healthcare practitioner, system, or setting to aggregate all of the pertinent data about a patient and forward it to another to support the continuity of care.
The primary use case for the CCD is to provide a snapshot in time containing the germane clinical, demographic, and administrative data for a specific patient. The key characteristic of a CCD is that the Composition.event.code is constrained to "PCPR". This means it does not function to report new services associated with performing care. It reports on care that has already been provided. The CCD provides a historical tally of the care over a range of time and is not a record of new services delivered.
More specific use cases, such as a Discharge Summary, Transfer Summary, Referral Note, Consultation Note, or Progress Note, are available as alternative profiles.

definition.value: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] type="34133-9" Summary of Episode (CodeSystem: LOINC urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.6.1) (CONF:2219-1072).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] event (CONF:2219-1225).

comment.value:
<!-- CAS Missing CCD documentationOf/serviceEvent/performer information that was above and beyond the standard US Realm Header. (CONF:1198-8458), (CONF:1198-30882), (CONF:1198-32466), (CONF:1198-32484), (CONF:1198-32467) From C-CDA R2.1: iii. This serviceEvent SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] performer (CONF:1198-8482). [Same as US Realm Header CONF:1198-14839] 1. The performer, if present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="PRF" Participation physical performer (CodeSystem: HL7ParticipationType urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.5.90 STATIC) (CONF:1198-8458). 2. The performer, if present, MAY contain zero or one [0..1] assignedEntity (CONF:1198-8459). [This is contradictory to US Realm Header CONF:1198-14841 which states "The performer, if present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedEntity"] a. The assignedEntity, if present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] id (CONF:1198-30882) such that it [US Realm Header CONF:1198-14846 states "This assignedEntity SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id"] i. If this assignedEntity is an assignedPerson, the assignedEntity SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] id such that it (CONF:1198-32466). 1. SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.4.6" National Provider Identifier (CONF:1198-32484). [US Realm Header CONF:1198-14847 states "Such ids SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.4.6" National Provider Identifier."] b. The assignedEntity, if present, MAY contain zero or one [0..1] assignedPerson (CONF:1198-32467).
Need extension, in original CDA mapping, it was determined this should be an extension to Composition.event (possibly in Composition.event.detail, which we may need more guidance on how best to model.) -->

definition.value: This event MAY contain zero or more [0..*] code="PCPR" Care Provision (CodeSystem: HL7ActClass urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.5.6) (CONF:2219-1227).
This event SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] period (CONF:2219-1226).
This period SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] start (CONF:2219-1228).
This period SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] end (CONF:2219-1229).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] section (CONF:2219-1065) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] section (CONF:2219-1049) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title (CONF:2219-1067).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code="48765-2" Allergies and Adverse Reactions (CodeSystem: LOINC urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.6.1) (CONF:2219-1066).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:2219-1068).
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] U.S. Core SmokingStatus Profile (identifier: http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/StructureDefinition/us-core-smokingstatus) (CONF:2219-2433).

SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] U.S. Core AllergyIntolerance Profile (identifier: http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/StructureDefinition/us-core-allergyintolerance) (CONF:2219-2088). SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] U.S. Core MedicationStatement Profile (identifier: http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/StructureDefinition/us-core-medicationstatement) (CONF:2219-2169). MAY contain zero or more [0..*] U.S. Core Condition Profile (identifier: http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/StructureDefinition/us-core-condition) (CONF:2219-2102). MAY contain zero or more [0..*] U.S. Core ObservationResults Profile (identifier: http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/StructureDefinition/us-core-observationresults) (CONF:2219-2103). SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] U.S. Core VitalSigns Profile (identifier: http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/StructureDefinition/us-core-vitalsigns) (CONF:2219-2154). SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] U.S. Core Procedure Profile (identifier: http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/StructureDefinition/us-core-procedure) (CONF:2219-2181). SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] U.S. Core Immunization Profile (identifier: http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/StructureDefinition/us-core-immunization) (CONF:2219-2252).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] section (CONF:2219-1051) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title (CONF:2219-1073).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code="10160-0" History of Medication Use (CodeSystem: LOINC urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.6.1) (CONF:2219-1074).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:2219-1075).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] section (CONF:2219-1050) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title (CONF:2219-1069).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code="11450-4" Problem List (CodeSystem: LOINC urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.6.1) (CONF:2219-1070).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:2219-1071).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] section (CONF:2219-1053) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title (CONF:2219-1079).
